main event: A UFO report from Kings Mountain, North Carolina on March 15, 1964, describing a long, wispy object or trail in the sky.
interesting points: The report includes references to 3 photographs, Two of the photographs show landscapes with varying cloud cover, One photograph displays a long, wispy object or trail in the sky against a dark background, There are no identifiable people in any of the photographs, The report is classified as unclassified by the Foreign Technology Division AFSC.
sighted object: a long, wispy object or trail in the sky
witness description: not applicable; report focuses on visual content in photographs
